messages.title: There's a May Way For Britain
messages.content: Strong, stable leadership in the national interest. A plan for Brexit and beyond. A stronger economy for your future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will give the NHS the resources it needs... ensuring that all GP practices are open from 8 am to 8 pm, 7 days a week.
A good school place for every child with more investment... and free school breakfast for every child in primary school.
We aim to create a new job opportunity every 80 seconds, setting up funding for experienced workers and major investment in skills training.
We will meet our 2015 commitment to deliver a million homes by the end of 2020 and will deliver half a million more by the end of 2022. We will also help more people to buy their own home.

issues.economy: A better deal for ordinary working people with more secure jobs, more affordable housing and lower energy bills.
issues.education: More good school places and better jobs.
issues.health: We will give the NHS the resources it needs...

housing.content: We will...help more people to buy their own home.

images.caption: Theresa May visiting facilities and people.
